--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers@t... wrote:
> OOC:Are those funnels sactioned....cuz they should be illegal, 
> since they are intercepting shots.....Also your post had gemini 
> dragon firing three weapons....another rule broken......
> 
> BIC:The Chivtron base shool hard as the huge blast hit the walls.  
> Dents could be seen from the inside and computer screens blinked 
> off, then back on.  Grounded knew he had to do something so he 
> bent to the ground, placing his hand on it.  His arm began to pulse 
> with a green hue.  Vines began to grow out from the ground around 
> the base, covering the walls in a organic shield 6 feet thick.
> 
> Seekker flew through the air trying to grab onto the ice head's 
face.

And as seeker flew towards it the left head curled and moved over to 
the left some more making him fly up a head. It then felt the need to 
try to turn the Chivtron into an icecle by launching a freeze beam at 
him. At the same time the right head launched a continous stream of 
fire at the Organic shield.

Elsewhere Vampiza finally arrived on the scene of the masive Chitron 
battle. His eyes immediately focused on Hotrod who he decided to 
attack first. His eyes began to glow as he send a ball of Chaochitan 
energy at Hotrod, however this ball was from a lower level Infecticon 
and thus it did not have as much energy as the ones from Hellpeon.
